job.title: Site Reliability Engineer / DevOps
job.description: <p><strong>Role: Site Reliability Engineers (SRE)<br>Location: Johns Creek, GA</strong> </p><p><strong>Duration: Long Term contract <br>Client: Macys<br><br>Note: Need for Site Reliability Engineer with Good experience on DevOps on Cloud<br><br><br>Job Description:</strong> </p><ul><li>Design and deliver robust, scalable, and secure distributed software systems. </li><li>Create/review technical design documentation and Provide leadership including constructive code reviews and design guidance to team members. </li><li>Work collaboratively in a group of passionate developers in a high-energy, fast-paced, and outcome-oriented environment. </li><li>Lead a technical team by example and foster growth in junior team members. </li><li>Regular, dependable attendance and punctuality. </li></ul><p><br><strong><u>Qualifications and Competencies:</u></strong> </p><ul><li>Overall 8+ years of experience in software development and high-volume enterprise systems. </li><li>Must have Java in-depth knowledge - as well as an ability in mastering other tools of the trade, including a variety of modern programming languages as well as experienced in open-source web and data technologies (Spring Boot, NoSQL, Microservices, Cloud services (Google preferred)). </li><li>3+ years of experience in Building cloud-native applications in private &amp; public cloud (GCP preferred). </li><li>4+ years of experience with open source technology technologies in a high volume distributed environment. </li><li>Experience working in a DevOps-oriented culture that prioritizes continuous integration and continuous deployment. </li><li>Experience in multi-channel retail technologies preferred. </li><li>Ability to effectively share technical information, communicate technical issues and solutions to all levels of business </li><li>Able to juggle multiple projects - can identify primary and secondary objectives, prioritize time and communicate timeline to team members </li><li>Ability and desire to take product/project ownership </li><li>Ability to work a flexible schedule based on department and Company needs. </li></ul><p><strong><br></strong> </p><p><strong><br>Regards,</strong><br><strong><br>Kanakesh Kadali</strong><br><strong>Business Development Manager</strong><br><strong>371 Hoes Lane, Suite 200 Piscataway, NJ </strong><br><strong>Direct: 732 456 8493</strong> </p><p><strong>Email: Kanakesh@dotstechnologies.com</strong></p>
